results.content:
Vraiment pour les débutants. Si vous cherchez un tuto pour voir la base de react, bootstrap, HTML et contentful, c'est un bon choix.
Sinon, si votre but était contentful et react, bien c'est plutôt décevant. Au 3/4 du tutoriel on a même pas encore vu contentful. Il y a beaucoup de longueur, on passe trop de temps sur des trucs répétitifs. Par exemple quand on a changé un icon, bien on a compris comment il faut faire pour les autres. Pas besoin de passer 10 min là-dessus pour remplir du temps
results.content_html:

results.content: The course is exactly what I needed and the instructor tried hard. The problem is he references code to download from outside sources that can't exist in the same state he had it as things change over time. He should have added the code as a download with the site. He also uses a lot of little poor coding choices like class instead of className for React.
results.content_html: The course is exactly what I needed and the instructor tried hard. The problem is he references code to download from outside sources that can't exist in the same state he had it as things change over time. He should have added the code as a download with the site. He also uses a lot of little poor coding choices like class instead of className for React.

results.content: Amazing course. Short, concise and explains integrating of react and contentful very well. Highly recommend for everyone who wants to learn contentful.

results.content:
This course is amazing! I absolutely loved how detailed it is and how lecturer Sarfaraz is explaining the code in a step by step manner. I can definitely say that a lot of effort has been put into the creation of this course and it is with no doubt is worth its money. Its just a fraction of a cost, of what you would have payed doing it through trial and error. 
Therefore I highly recommend "Build a Website using Reactjs and Contentful (Headless CMS)"!!!!
